resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108752</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108752</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205223</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Mining Landscape</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Gewinnenlandschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Horizontal d'Extraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma Paisagem Minando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Paesaggio Estraente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα τοπίο μεταλλείας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Paisaje Que mina</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This Flash simulation shows copper mining and metallurgical extraction with alternative methods and uses of unit processes, especially emphasising the role and importance of new biotechnological alternatives (bioleaching).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese grelle Simulation zeigt Kupferbergbau und 
metallurgische Extraktion mit alternativen Methoden und Gebräuchen 
von Maßeinheit Prozessen und besonders hebt die Rolle und den Wert 
der neuen biotechnological Alternativen hervor (Bioleaching).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette simulation instantanée montre 
l'exploitation de en cuivre et l'extraction métallurgique avec des 
méthodes et des utilisations alternatives des processus d'unité, 
particulièrement soulignant le rôle et l'importance de nouvelles 
solutions de rechange biotechnological (bioleaching).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta simulação flash mostra a mineração do 
cobre e a extração metalúrgica com métodos e usos alternativos de 
processos da unidade, especial emfatizando o papel e a importância de
alternativas biotechnological novas (bioleaching).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa simulazione istantanea mostra l'estrazione 
mineraria del rame e l'estrazione metallurgica con i metodi e gli usi 
alternativi di processi dell'unità, particolarmente dando risalto al 
ruolo ed all'importanza di nuove alternative biotechnological 
(bioleaching).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η προσομοίωση λάμψης εμφανίζει τη μεταλλεία 
χαλκού και μεταλλουργική εξαγωγή με τις εναλλακτικές μεθόδους και
τις χρήσεις των διαδικασιών μονάδων, υπογραμμίζοντας ειδικά το 
ρόλο και τη σημασία των νέων βιοτεχνολογικών εναλλακτικών λύσεων
().</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta simulación de destello muestra la 
explotación minera del cobre y la extracción metalúrgica con 
métodos y aplicaciones alternativos de los procesos de la unidad, 
especialmente acentuando el papel y la importancia de los nuevos 
alternativas biotechnological (el bioleaching).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

        </lifeCycle>

        <educational>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108752</entry>
    </identifier>
